TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PackageDigitalSignature extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示应用于一组包部件和关系的数字签名。

span.span: Represents a digital signature that is applied to a set of package parts and relationships.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是不可变的，并且在创建后将无法更改。A object is immutable and cannot be altered after it is created. 为安全， 可以将与中的部件相关联 。For security, a can be associated with parts within a . 包含提供两个功能的 x.509 证书：A incorporates an X.509 certificate that provides two features: - 标识部件的发信方并对其进行身份验证。Identifies and authenticates the originator of the part. - 验证部件是否尚未被修改。Validates that the part has not been modified. 数字签名不会阻止修改某个部分，但是，如果该部件以任何方式进行了更改，则对签名的验证检查将失败。The digital signature does not preclude a part from being modified, but a validation check against the signature fails if the part has changed in any way. 然后，应用程序可以执行相应的操作（例如，它可以阻止部件打开，也可以通知用户部分已修改且不安全）。The application can then take appropriate action - for example, it can prevent the part from opening or it can notify the user that the part has been modified and is not secure. 有关包数字签名的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN 文章 [开放打包约定的数字签名框架](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494)。For more information about package digital signatures, see the MSDN article [Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).

span.span: Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) Specification

related.span: 开放打包约定的数字签名框架

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CertificateEmbeddingOption As CertificateEmbeddingOption

summary.span: 获取 X.509 证书嵌入选项。

span.span: Gets the X.509 certificate embedding option.

value.span: 值之一，指定数字签名的选项。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the option for the digital signature.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 用于验证包的 x.509 证书可能存储在以下三个位置之一：X.509 certificates used to validate a package may be stored in one of three locations: ||| |-|-| ||在包中其自身的证书中 。In its own certificate in the package.

可以通过属性获取 x.509 证书 。The X.509 certificate can be obtained through the property.| ||在包的内容中 。Within the content of the in the package.

可以通过属性获取 x.509 证书 。The X.509 certificate can be obtained through the property.| ||包在包的外部，该位置由创建签名的应用程序和以后使用签名进行验证的应用程序识别。External to the package in a location known by both the application that creates the signature and the application that later uses the signature for validation.|

span.span: The digital has been deleted.

related.span: 开放打包约定的数字签名框架

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML 数字签名。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML digital signature.
The XML digital signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供对基础类的访问，该基础类执行类型特定的签名加密功能，并与托管签名的相关的进行序列化 。 provides access to the foundation class that performs type-specific signature cryptographic functions and serialization to and from the that hosts the signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 x.509 证书存储在 (包中时，返回签名者的证书，当 为或) 时，为 。 returns the X.509 certificate of the signer when the digital certificate is stored within the package (that is, when is or ). `null`当) 时，如果 x.509 证书未存储在包 (中，则返回 。 returns `null` when the X.509 certificate is not stored in the package (that is, when is ).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SigningTime As DateTime
public: property DateTime SigningTime { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取创建签名的日期和时间。

span.span: Gets the date and time that the signature was created.

value.span: 创建签名的日期和时间。

span.span: The date and time that the signature was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定日期的格式。The property specifies the format of the date. 字符串的格式 基于 创建签名时有效的属性。The format of the string is based on the property in effect when the signature was created. 基于发生签名的计算机的系统时间。 is based on the system time of the computer where the signing took place. 不是 "安全时间戳"，不是来自受信任的时间戳颁发机构。 is not a "secure TimeStamp" and is not from trusted Time Stamp Authority. 安全时间戳必须通过受信任的时间戳颁发机构获取和应用。A secure TimeStamp must be obtained and applied through a trusted Time Stamp Authority.

span.span: The digital has been deleted.

related.span: 开放打包约定的数字签名框架

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TimeFormat As String
public: property System::String ^ TimeFormat { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取由 属性返回的日期和时间的格式。

span.span: Gets the format of the date and time returned by the property.

value.span: 由 属性返回的日期和时间的格式。

span.span: The format of the date and time returned by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 日期/时间格式遵循 W3C [日期和时间格式](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=84446) 的语法说明。Date/time formats follow the syntax of the W3C [Date and Time Formats](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=84446) note. 下表中所示的组件必须使用所示的语法和标点。The components shown in the following table must use the syntax and punctuation shown. |TimeFormatTimeFormat|描述Description|示例Example| |----------------|-----------------|-------------| |YYYYYYYY|YearYear|20052005| |YYYY-MMYYYY-MM|年和月Year and month|2005-072005-07| |YYYY-MM-DDYYYY-MM-DD|完成日期Complete date|2005-07-282005-07-28| |YYYY-MM-Yyyy-mm-ddthh： mmTZDYYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD|完成日期加上小时和分钟Complete date plus hours and minutes|2005-07-28T19： 20-01：002005-07-28T19:20-01:00| |YYYY-MM-Yyyy-mm-ddthh： MM： ssTZDYYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD|完成日期加上小时、分钟和秒Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds|2005-07-28T19：20： 45-01：002005-07-28T19:20:45-01:00| |YYYY-MM-Yyyy-mm-ddthh： MM： ss. sTZDYYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD|完成日期加上小数部分的小时、分钟和秒Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds with a decimal fraction|2005-07-28T19：20： 45.75-01：002005-07-28T19:20:45.75-01:00| 其中：where: ||| |-|-| |YYYYYYYY|四位数年份 (例如 2006) four-digit year (for example 2006)| |MMMM|两位数月份 (01 = 一月) two-digit month (01=January)| |DDDD|两位数的月份日期（01 到 31）two-digit day of month (01 through 31)| |ThhThh|两位数的小时 (00 到23、24小时时间) two-digit hour (00 through 23, 24-hour time)| |MMmm|两位数的分钟 (00 到 59) two digits of minutes (00 through 59)| |ssss| (00 到59的两位数秒数) two digits of seconds (00 through 59)| |ss|一个或多个数字，表示秒的小数部分one or more digits representing a decimal fraction of a second| |TZDTZD|时区指示符 (Z 或 + hh： mm 或-hh： mm) time zone designator (Z or +hh:mm or -hh:mm)|

span.span: The digital has been deleted.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult Verify() cil managed

summary.span: 根据 X.509 证书验证数字签名。

span.span: Verifies the digital signature against an X.509 certificate.

returns.span: 如果验证成功，则为 ；否则为标识问题的 值之一。

span.span: if the verification succeeded; otherwise, one of the values that identifies a problem.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法根据存储在中的嵌入 x.509 证书来验证签名 。This method verifies the signature against an embedded X.509 certificate stored in the .

param.name: signingCertificate

returns.span: 如果验证成功，则为 ；否则为标识问题的 值之一。
